name.title: Name
name.description: The Name that will show up in homebridge log.

noMotionTimer.title: No Motion Timer
noMotionTimer.description: optional, defaults to 60 and applies to WeMo Motion only. It is a timer in seconds for how long after motion is not detected that the state is changed.

ignoredDevices.title: Ignored Devices
ignoredDevices.description: optional, Expects an array of serial numbers, any devices found with matching serial numbers will be skipped or removed from Homebridge.

manualDevices.title: Manual Devices
manualDevices.description: optional, Expects an array of device setup urls (eg. "http://192.168.1.20:49153/setup.xml") to be configured manually outside the device discovery process.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: optional, defaults to true. A way to disable device discovery if not required.
